title: 求刷怪笼指令
txt_content:
求刷怪笼指令，要手中拿到那种，完整指令，不要/setblock 
重申一遍，我要手上那种

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
give @s minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:skeleton"},SpawnPotentials:[{Entity:{id:"minecraft:skeleton"},Weight:1}]}}
复制代码请说出你的版本

ruhuasiyu 发表于 2018-5-29 20:52
请说出你的版本
1.7.10呃呃呃

replies.author: Anti@
replies.txt_content:
give id 52 1(52是刷怪笼ID)
/spawner 列出可以改的刷怪笼类型
